entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023
